headline: Ad Watch: Fact-checking ad claiming Republican US Senate candidate Dave McCormick paid for attacks on Donald Trump
author: Matt Barcaro
sentences: In an 8 On Your Side investigation, WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro looked into an ad in the race for the U.S. Senate that claims a Republican candidate paid for attacks on Donald Trump.

Ad Watch: Fact-checking ad attacking Republican US Senate candidate Dave McCormick
